J1939 Incoming Single Point Page

J1939 Single Point contains any single-point J1939 frames selected to acquire.

What do you want to do?

Import frames

To import frames, select Single-Point in the configuration tree and click the Import Frames button. You also can right-click Single-Point in the configuration tree and select Import Frames from the shortcut menu. Note that you can just select the J1939 parameters of interest within a given frame. You do not have to select the entire frame.

Delete multiple frames

To delete multiple frames, right-click Single-Point in the configuration tree and select Delete Multiple Frames from the shortcut menu.
